greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the constant x that satisfies: 1 = Sum_{n>=1} x^(n*(n+1)/2).
comment: Equals the radius of convergence of the g.f. of A023361 (number of compositions into sums of triangular numbers).
mathematica: x /. FindRoot[ EllipticTheta[2, 0, Sqrt[x]] == 4*x^(1/8), {x, 1/2}, WorkingPrecision -> 110] // RealDigits[#, 10, 105]& // First (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 13 2013 *)
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Apr 29 2005
